QuestData.Title: Called to the Throne
QuestData.Description: It was not long after I arrived in Nagrand that the voice of Kalandrios called out to me upon the wind.$b$bIt is a great honor to be called to the Throne of Elements, but my heart was heavy sensing the purpose.$b$bThere is dark malaise in the air, it can be felt all around us. It surrounds all life here...enveloping...smothering...$b$bCome, it is time we commune with the furies and lend them our aid. An invisible shadow has been cast upon this valley and it may be up to us to remove it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Commune with the furies at the Throne of Elements.
QuestData.RewardText: I fear that this disturbance is more dire than I had anticipated.$b$bWhatever it is...it threatens to unravel the elemental bonds that hold this world together.
